title: Portion of income impacts elasticity of demand

content.question: The absolute value of the price elasticity of demand for a good increases when

choices.label: consumers spend greater portion of their budget on the good
the price of an input used to produce the good increases
the good must be purchased immediately

content.answer: consumers spend greater portion of their budget on the good
